Class Birthday

java.lang.Object
cmpt213.assignment.importantdaystracker.model.ImportantDay
cmpt213.assignment.importantdaystracker.model.Birthday
public class Birthday extends ImportantDay
This is a subclass of ImportantDay It contains an additional String attribute: personName Also contains a constructor, getPersonName, getAge, getType, and toString method
